data.title: UK oil imports by country
data.meta_description: Where does the UK get its oil from? In 2022, the UK imported oil from more than 20 countries with the United States and Norway among the main sources.
data.text:
Oil liquids imports in the UK 2022, by country

Published by Statista Research Department,

Import volume of crude oil and natural gas liquids to the United Kingdom (UK) in 2022, by country of origin (in 1,000 metric tons)
